articles.title: Why Apple’s (AAPL) AI Push Could Be the Key to Dominating the Market?

articles.title: Spotify stock is trading at all-time highs just 2 years after a record low. Here's how it got there.
articles.content: Spotify has staged an epic comeback, with its stock price increasing sixfold over the past two years. But the journey to get here hasn't been easy.

articles.title: If You’re Checking That Bag, It Had Better Have an AirTag
articles.content: Make sure the battery isn’t low and turn on Lost Mode—even if the luggage isn’t lost—for more frequent alerts.

articles.title: Apple’s App Store Puts Kids a Click Away From a Slew of Inappropriate Apps
articles.content: An analysis recommends that Apple, an emerging target for digital-safety advocates, apply an independent review for software age ratings.

articles.title: Steve Ballmer, the Non-Investing Guru of Investing
articles.content: There is one very glaring exception:  Steve Ballmer.  The former  Microsoft  chief executive has put nearly all his eggs in one basket and kept them there for years.  Ballmer has virtually no exposure to alternative investments.

articles.title: Here's the Average Net Worth by Age and 5 Ways to Make Money in 2025 and Beyond
articles.content: The Federal Reserve conducts its Survey of Consumer Finances (SCF) every three years.  The report provides a snapshot of the financial conditions of U.S. households, measuring income, assets, and debt across various demographic categories.  The median net worth among U.S. families at the time was $192,700.
